title: Language Education Standards Development and Dissemination: Comparative Analysis of Linear vs. Modular Design

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic language education concepts
context.additional_context: A practical language education standards development course for practicing professionals

learning_goals: Explain the language education standard development process by categorizing it into at least three phases
Compare and analyze the core differences between linear and modular learning design
Draft a language standard development project applicable to real educational settings
Establish localization strategies by referencing international cases such as the Common European Framework of Reference for Languages (CEFR)

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
